label: BinaryFile
comment: A specified computer file or program stored in a binary format.

datatypeProperties.comment: Access information, expressed as text, for this specified binary file, such as security and download parameters.
A name of an author, expressed as text, of this specified binary file.
The code specifying the character set for this specified binary file.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
The code specifying the encoding of this specified binary file.
The file name, expressed as text, of this specified binary file.
A binary object included in this specified binary file.
The code specifying the Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type for this specified binary file.
A title, expressed as text, for this specified binary file.
A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this specified certification.
The identifier for the version of this exchanged declaration.

objectProperties.comment: The specified period when access to this binary file is available.
The measure of the size of this specified binary file.
A period of validity specified for this referenced document.

referencedBy.comment: A binary file attached for this sustainability inspection.
A binary file attached for this sustainability inspection.
A binary file attached for this sustainability inspection.
